body.p: The objective of this IFRS is to specify the financial reporting by an entity when it undertakes a share‑based payment transaction. In particular, it requires an entity to reflect in its profit or loss and financial position the effects of share‑based payment transactions, including expenses associated with transactions in which share options are granted to employees.
